nodes.text: The Rakata machine caves was a cave system located in The Tomb, an ancient prison on the planet Belsavis. Located in Frozencavern Canyon, the cave system was the site of stasis generators that powered the containment systems in the rest of the Tomb, and during the invasion of Belsavis, Republic forces prevented the Esh-kha species from disabling the generators and freeing the Tomb's prisoners.
The Rakata machine caves appears as a location on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, and is the site of the Republic Heroic mission "The Stasis Generator."
